org.apache.karaf.profile.assembly

Class ArtifactInstaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.karaf.profile.assembly.ArtifactInstaller

  • public class ArtifactInstaller
extends java.lang.Object
    Downloads a maven artifact and installs it into the given system directory. The layout follows the conventions of a maven local repository.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArtifactInstaller(java.nio.file.Path systemDirectory, Downloader downloader, Blacklist blacklist)
